data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: As the international spotlight turns to China and the 2008 Beijing Olympics, the international public is showing signs of apprehension about the country and its growing power. Overall, favorable views of my home country, China, have increased over the last decade. Personally speaking, positive perceptions about the diversity and taste of Chinese food are what foreign visitors share in common. No matter which city to visit, each foreign visitor must have a list of must-try local dishes he or she plans to have. There are huge distinctions among foods one can get in different regions across China. And there is no doubt that each foreign visitor will find Chinese food surprisingly amazing. (111字)
data.referenceText: What is a typical perception of your country by foreign visitors?
data.referenceTranslate: 外国游客对你们国家的典型印象是什么?
